title: Sound Definitions
description: Defines sound events and their associated audio files. This file maps sound event identifiers to one or more sound files that can play when that event is triggered. Located at sounds/sound_definitions.json in resource packs.

tokens.text: maps sound event identifiers to their audio files and playback settings

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of the sound definitions file. Should be '1.14.0' or higher.

fields.title: Sound Definitions
fields.description: A collection of sound event definitions, where each key is a sound event identifier (e.g., 'mob.zombie.say') and the value defines which sounds can play for that event.

subForm.title: Sound Definition Entry
subForm.description: Defines a single sound event with its category and associated sound files.

fields.title: Category
fields.description: The audio category this sound belongs to. Controls which volume slider affects this sound in settings.

fields.title: Sounds
fields.description: Array of sound files or sound objects that can play for this event. When multiple sounds are defined, one is chosen randomly.

subForm.title: Sound Entry
subForm.description: A sound file reference with optional playback properties.

fields.title: Name
fields.description: Path to the sound file relative to the sounds folder, without the file extension (e.g., 'sounds/mob/zombie/say1').

fields.title: Volume
fields.description: Volume multiplier for this sound. Can be a single value or a range [min, max]. Default is 1.0.

fields.title: Pitch
fields.description: Pitch multiplier for this sound. Can be a single value or a range [min, max]. Default is 1.0.

fields.title: Load on Low Memory
fields.description: If true, this sound will be loaded even on devices with low memory. Use sparingly for critical sounds.

fields.title: Stream
fields.description: If true, the sound will be streamed from disk rather than loaded into memory. Recommended for long sounds like music.

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: Relative probability weight for this sound when multiple sounds are defined. Higher values make this sound more likely to be chosen.

fields.title: Is 3D
fields.description: If true, this sound is positional and will have 3D audio properties.

fields.title: Minimum Distance
fields.description: The minimum distance in blocks at which the sound starts to attenuate.

fields.title: Maximum Distance
fields.description: The maximum distance in blocks at which the sound can be heard.
